text: Basi ni jwaatulwisye (pa uchimbichimbi wao) mwakwanyenjelela. Basi pandema jaŵapasyisye (isogosi ya) chitelacho, waonechele kukwao umakonope wao, ni ŵatandite kulinyambatika masamba ga mu Litimbemo, ni jwaaŵilasile M'mbuje gwao (juchitiji): “Ana nganinankanya ŵanaŵaŵilimmwe achi chitelachi, ni kunsalila kuti chisimu shetani kukwenu ni mmagongo jwakuonechela?”
